choose.when: insert into tbl_b_f_reply (b_f_r_no, b_f_no , reply, replyer, rereply_no) values(seq_board_free_reply.nextval, #{b_f_no}, #{reply}, #{replyer} ,#{b_f_r_no})
choose.otherwise: insert into tbl_b_f_reply (b_f_r_no, b_f_no , reply, replyer) values(seq_board_free_reply.nextval, #{b_f_no}, #{reply}, #{replyer})

mapper.select: SELECT b_f_no, b_f_r_no, reply, replyer, good, replydate, updatedate, rereply_no, LEVEL AS reply_level FROM tbl_b_f_reply WHERE b_f_no = #{b_f_no} START WITH rereply_no IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR b_f_r_no = rereply_no ORDER SIBLINGS BY replydate
